column4: does anyone know how i can set the function keys on my laptop
i downloaded i810switch to enable vga out on my laptop.. all my other function keys work fine.. ijust need to run i810rotate when i hit fn+f8...
i just don't want it to end up overwriting the working keys...
i am not having any luck capturing fn keystrokes
if i run just -k to capture any key.. pressing Fn doesn't yeild anything
if i press f8 by itself, that works..
thanks for your help anyways.. you wouldn't be familiar with xinerama would you? =)
